subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush to host new Japanese PM in Washington

04/25/07 09:45 PM, EDT
U.S. President George W. Bush welcomes Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe on Thursday as both leaders deal with low popularity at home and some creeping tension in their countries' usually strong alliance.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Top general says Iraqi sectarian murders are down

04/25/07 09:30 PM, EDT
The top U.S. commander in Iraq, Gen. David Petraeus, told reporters Wednesday that sectarian murders in Baghdad have been reduced by about one-third since the beginning of the year.
FULL STORY
